General.Name: Royce Micro Cap Closed Fund
General.Description: Royce Micro-Cap Trust, Inc. is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed Royce & Associates, LLC. It invests in the public equity markets of the United States. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. It primarily invests in value stocks of companies with market capitalization of less than $500 million. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolios against Russell 2000 Index. Royce Micro-Cap Trust, Inc was formed on December 14, 1993 and is domiciled in the United States.
General.Address: 745 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10151

2.Name: Mr. James J. Harvey C.F.A., CFA
2.Title: Principal and Portfolio Mang.
